name: Blake the Ghosthunter
description:
Blake the Ghosthunter is a game for the "GameDev.tv  GameJam 2022". 

We had 10 days to make a game and the theme was "Death is just the beginning!".

I had really fun making this game!

Nothing is more frustrating than not being able to fix a bug... 

Nothing is more sasatisfying then being able to finally fix it!!!

I don't need drugs... scripts are MY lines! :D

Thanks for playing and please leave a feedback!
